title: Input schema for the empty project actor.

website.title: Website
website.description: This is top level domain that will determine in what language will the input and output be. Note that this is really important, for example if i enter 'cz' and then i go from Brno to Prague, it will not work because Prague is in English, so i have two options in this scenario. I can change it to 'com' for example or i can change from 'Prague' to 'Praha', which is Prague in czech

from.title: From
from.description: This is the departing city. Note that it is key sensitive.

to.title: To
to.description: This is the arrival city. Note that it is key sensitive.

students.title: Students
students.description: Select number of students traveling, note that students are required to show valid Student ID.

children_0_5.title: Children (0-5)
children_0_5.description: Select number of children (0 to 5 years old) traveling.

children_6_17.title: Children (6-17)
children_6_17.description: Select number of children (6 to 17 years old) traveling.

seniors.title: Seniors
seniors.description: Select number of seniors (older than 65 years old) traveling.

bikes.title: Bikes
bikes.description: Select number of bike slots, note that E-bikes and scooters are not allowed on buses.
